lead_paragraph: The story of Melanie Oudin’s rise to the big stage in Arthur Ashe Stadium is apparently a complex one including her parents’ continuing divorce case.
snippet: The story of Melanie Oudin’s rise to the big stage in Arthur Ashe Stadium is apparently a complex one including her parents’ continuing divorce case.
